page.title: 10LITTLE WYMONDLEY CHURCHES
page.content: {ST MARY THE VIRGIN}Rev:P.J. MADDEX. It is a small white church just off the main road. Behind the church there are some houses and it is near a railway line.The church is near {Wymondley Bury.}A small lane leads up to the church gate. There is a big gate and by that there is a small gate called a{kissing gate.}From the gate to the church there is a small gravel path with a few grave stones on each side. A few families from the Symonds Green neighbourhood attend the church. {Wymondley Baptist Chapel.}This is a small chapel on the Hitchin Road in the village. Although it does not have a paid minister it is well attended.
